*jscep* has three mailing lists on Google Groups, all of which are very low traffic:

*[http://groups.google.com/group/jscep-support jscep-support]*

For requesting support or advice on using *jscep*.  This mailing list should not be used for reporting bugs or requesting features.  Instead, please use the [http://code.google.com/p/jscep/issues/list issues] project page. 

*[http://groups.google.com/group/jscep-announce jscep-announce]*

For announcement of new releases and other noteworthy news.

*[http://groups.google.com/group/jscep-discuss jscep-discuss]*

For public discussion of *jscep*.
